SELECT A.NO , A.P_NO AS PRODUCT_NO , P.SERIAL_NUMBER , P.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME , A.CUSTOMER_NAME , A.CUSTOMER_AREA , A.CUSTOMER_ADRESS , A.CUSTOMER_PHONE , A.PURCHASE_DATE , A.WARRANTY_YN , A.ISSUE_TITLE , A.ISSUE_DESCRIPTION , A.PREFERRED_SERVICE_DATE , A.STATUS_CODE , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MODIFY_DATE , A.DEL_YN FROM AS_REQUEST A JOIN PRODUCT_REGISTRATION P ON (A.P_NO = P.NO) WHERE A.STATUS_CODE = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.CUSTOMER_AREA = #{area}
AND P.SERIAL_NUMBER LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND P.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND A.ISSUE_TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND A.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY A.NO DESC OFFSET #{pvo.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pvo.boardLimit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(A.NO) FROM AS_REQUEST A JOIN PRODUCT_REGISTRATION P ON (A.P_NO = P.NO) WHERE A.STATUS_CODE = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.CUSTOMER_AREA = #{area}
AND P.SERIAL_NUMBER LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND P.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND A.ISSUE_TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND A.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
